TopicTitle: [NOW WITH ATLAS AGENA TARGET VEHICLE!] Project Jebini - Replica Gemini Titan

Articles.Content:
UPDATE - 23rd of July 2013

Added the Atlas Agena target vehicle. Enough fuel to get into orbit with a little left over for orbit maneuvers.

100% Stock replicas of the craft involved in the Gemini project.

The Files!

Gemini Titan - http://www./?2g8rwecd17j0pxb

G.A.T.V Atlas Agena - http://www./download/aao843a7668k39u/J_A_T_V.craft

Jebini Titan

This ship has just enough DV to get into orbit and back again. This has room for 2 Kerbals but only starts with one on board - A handy launch tower is provided to load a second Kerbal on board!

Launch Procedure

1. Extend ladders on Launchpad (Hotkey "1")

2. Load second Kerbal! (perhaps you can drive one over from the SPH?

3. Hit Stage to retract the crew gantry.

4. Throttle to 100%

5. Set ASAS

6. Hit Stage to launch!

Fuel is very, very tight so you may need to practice your ascent... I usually begin a gravity turn at 8,000 meter to about 70 degrees, then follow the prograde marker down stopping at 45 degrees. Once AP is 35km you can drop your angle gradually down to the horizon... i usually hit the horizon with an AP of about 50-55km

JATV (Jebini Agena Target Vehicle)

Mulbin what gave you the idea for the name?

It's just "Jeb".. as in "Jebediah" stuck on the name of the real ship... "Gemini Titan" Gemini was the Module, Titan was the type of Rocket.

UPDATE!!!

V1.01 now on the download link. Fixed the over sensitive launch tower... shouldn't blow up anymore!

Hmm so whats the Titan's Kerbalized name?

I don't generally Kerbalize both names as I like to keep them recognizable! Little Jeb, Moho Redstone, Moho Atlas etc... the exception is Munbug but that's just because I called my Mun ships Munbug long before I made them look like Apollo.
Ok (K Syndrome look away) How about Kebini Kitan, Katurn K, Moho Katlas, Little Koe, Moho Kedstone.
